tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Nupur Jhunjhunwala is a very professional doctor.  I was very comfortable with her approach to my dental fillings. She is very meticulous and was able to understand my dental problems very well.
She was very thorough and gentle while doing my dental fillings.  She also explained to me very succinctly my other dental problems and how they need to be tackled.
All in all a very good experience with Dr Nupur Jhunjhunwala.
I would definitely visit her again and definitely recommend her to others who require dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was terribly worried about my appointment as to what is going to happen. I was nervous. I had a nagging toothache and was told by other dental surgeons that the tooth is moving and may need an extraction. Dr Nupur did my tooth‚Äôs scan and decided on an extraction. This was very well explained  to me and I was now more relaxed and settled. While on the chair before I realised much my affected tooth was out - no pain no bleeding and I was there talking to the Doctor- ALL DONE so very well and me back to normal virtually instantly / üôèüôè
Well done Dr Jhunjhunwala
